verses.content: LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk angin, sahmul dumpâwl, a êm le seninlârin Hmun Inthienga rawng- bâwlna dingin silfên ṭhatakhai an siem a, Aron silfên inthienghaiah an siem a.
Zakawsîng chu rângkachak zai le sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, le seninlâr le, pat zai inhmi kawpin an siem a.
Rângkachak chu phêk inphân- takhaiin an sut a, a zaiin an ât a, kutthiemtak sinthaw, sahmul dum- pâwl, a êm, seninlâr le pat zai inhmi kawpa zep dingin.
Zakawsînga chun a liengko bel- hai a hmawrhai pahnia ama le ṭhui matin an siem a.

Zakaw chunga a khitna, kâwng- chûn chu hmangruo thuhmun le khâwng dân thuhmuna thiemtaka khâwng, rângkachak zai, sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, le seninlâr le pat zai inhmi kawpa, LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk ang taka siem a nih.
Onik lunghai chu an ât a, Israel thlahai hming ang peiin, hming- namna ker anga rângkachak ker- kuokhaia chun an phûm a.
LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk anga Israel thlahai ta dinga hriet zingna lunghai ni dingin zakawsînga liengko belhaia chun a sieh a.
Chun, kutthiemtak siem dânin, zakawsîng siem ang bawk chun, rângkachak zai le sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, seninlâr le pat zai inhmi kawpin âwmbel a siem a,
killi inchen seng a nih a: âwmbel chu thlep thuoa siem a nih a, thlep thuo chun a seizie khâp khat, a lienzie khâp khat bawk a nih.
Chutaka chun lunghai chu tlar liin an inbûk a, sardion, topaz le karbankle lung chu tlar khatna a nih.
A tlar hnina chu emeral, sapphir le diamond lung;
a tlar thumna chu jasinth, agate le amethust lung,
a tlar lina chu birul, onik le jasper lunghai a nih a; rângkachak kerkuokhaia phûm an nih.
Lunghai chu sâwm le pahnih, Israel naupasalhai hming ang peia an hming leh, hnam sâwmpahnia dingin lung tin chu a hming pei leh, hmingnamna anga siem a nih.
Âwmbel chunga chun rângka- chak kerkuok pahni le rângkachak inthieng khaidiet, hruol anga inher- thlawp an siem a.
Rângkachak kerkuok pahni le rângkachak kuol pahni bawk an siem a, a kuol pahni chu âwmbel tâwp ve vea chun an inbûk a.
Rângkachak khaidiethai pahni chu âwmbel hmawra kuol pahnia chun an inbûk a.
Khaidiet hmawr khingtieng pahni chu kerkuok pahnia chun an inbûk a, zakawsîng liengko bel hma- tieng panga chun an khai a.
Rângkachak kuol pahni an siem a, âwmbel hmawr khing tieng sîr tâwp, sûngtieng pang zakawsîng deptienga chun an inbûk a.
Rângkachak kuol pahni an siem a, hmatiengah zakawsîng liengko bel hnuoitieng pang zakawsîng khitna thiemtaka khâwng chunga ân tuok- naa khan an inbûk a.

LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk ang taka, âwmbel chu zakawsîngah det- taka a kawp theina ding le, zakaw- sîng khitna thiemtaka khâwng chung- a chun a um theina dingin, âwmbela kuolhai chu zakawsînga kuolhaia chun hrui dumpâwlin an khit mat a.
Chun, thiempu zakawfuol a khâwnga khâwngin a dumpâwl vawngin a siem a;
Zakawfuola a âwng chu indona phaw zakuo anga, ân ek nawna dinga a vêl tuoka tuom a nih.
Zakawfuol hmawr tlânga chun dumpâwl, a êm, seninlâr le patzai inhmi kawpin theibufai an siem a.
Rângkachak inthiengin telnêng- hai an siem bawk a, telnênghai chu theibufai inkâr, zakawfuol hmawr tlânga a vêl suoka theibufai inkâra chun an khai a:
LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk angin, rawngbâwlna ding zakawfuol hmawr tlâng vêl suoka chun, telnêng theibu- fai, telnêng le theibufai ti peia khaiin.
Aron le a naupasalhai ta dingin puon zai inhmi a khâwnga khâwngin zakawchunghai an siem a,
puon zai inhmi lukâwm, puon zai inhmi lukhum, puon zai inhmi kawpin puon zai inhmi kekawr hnuoihai,
puon zai inhmi kawp ṭhatak le sahmul dumpâwl, a êm le senin- lâr ṭhuimawia chei kâwngchûn, LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk ang chun an siem bawk a.
Rângkachak inthiengin lukhim inthieng phêk an siem a, chutaka chun “LALPA TA DINGA INTHIENG” ti an ziek a.
LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk anga a chunga lukâwma khitdena dingin hrui dumpâwl an inbûk a.
Chuong ang chun intuokna puon in sin po po chu zo a ni tah a, chun Israel thlahai chun LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk po po angtak chun an thawh a, chuong ang tak chun an thaw tah a.
Biekbûk chu Mosie kuomah an hung lâk a, a puon in le a hmangruo po po, a kuoikimhai, a thingphêkhai, a bangruhai, a banhai le ân ṭhut- nahai;
ân khumna berâmchal le kêl vun suksenhai, a chung inkhumna seal vunhai, a puonzâr khaihai:
Thuthlung bâwm le a zâwn- funghai, zângaina ṭhungpha leh;
dawkân le a bûrlebêlhai po po le inentirna bei,
Rângkachak inthienga siem sathâukhâwnvar siena le khâwn- varhai, a khâwnvarhai siena pei leh a hmangruo po po, meivar dinga hriek;
rângkachak mâichâm, innâlna hriek, riminhnik rawmi le puon in kawtkhâr puonzâr ding;
dâr mâichâm le dâr inphan thuk, zâwnfunghai le a bûrlebêl po pohai, dâr maihûn le ân ṭhutna;
tuolzâwl inhuonna puonzâr khaihai, a banhai, a kerkuokhai, tuolzâwl inhuonna kawtkhâra puon- zâr, a hruihai, a kilnahai, biekbûk le intuokna puon ina dinga rawng- bâwlna hmangruo po po;
Hmun Inthienga rawngbâwlna dinga silfên khâwng ṭhatakhai, thiempu Aron silfênhai le, thiempu sina rawngbâwlna dinga a naupasal- hai silfênhai le chun an hung lâk a.
LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk po po ang tak chun Israel thlahai chun sin po po chu an thaw tah a.
Mosie chun an sinthawhai po po chu a en a, LALPAIN thu a pêk ang tak chun an thaw zo tah ti a hmuh a; chuong ang tak chun an thaw zo tah a; chun, Mosiein anni chu mal a sâwm tah a.
